creator: cristian.fogel@softvision.ro
summary: Link is updated but content displayed is still for the search result

assigned_to_detail.name: nobody@mozilla.org
assigned_to_detail.real_name: Nobody; OK to take it and work on it

comments.text:
Created attachment 8984956
about _ tracking protection section not displayed after opening options in search.gif

[Affected versions]:
-Nightly 62.0a1

[Affected platforms]:
- win 10x64;
- win 7x32

[Steps to reproduce]:
1. Open Firefox
2. Open the about:preferences section;
3. Click Inside the "Find in Options" search box;
4. Type "theme" and press Enter on the keyboard;
5. Click on the Colors button;
6. Close the window;
7. Click on the Hamburger menu;
8. Click on the Tracking Protection button

[Expected result]:
- Link and content is displayed for about:preferences#privacy-trackingprotection

[Actual result]:
- link is updated but content displayed is still the one from the search results.

[Regression range]:
- not a regression.

[Additional notes]:
- attached screencast with the issue
comments.author: cristian.fogel@softvision.ro

comments.text:
Adding some extra info.

[Affected platforms]:
- macOS 10.13.4;
- Ubuntu 16.04 LTS.

comments.text: Interesting edge case for the spotlight feature...
